content: उत्तान {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Stretched out, spread out, expanded, dilated; उत्तानतारक्रस्य लोचनयुगलस्य <ls>K. 143</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 23.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Lying on the back, with the face upwards, supine; <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; उत्तानोच्छूनमंडूकपाटितोदरसंनिभे <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 248.</ls> ({%b%}) Upright, erect. {@--3@} Open, turned upwards; उत्तानपाणिद्वयसंनिवेशात् <ls>Ku. 3. 45</ls>; °रशिमषु <ls>Pt. 3. 150.</ls> {@--4@} Open, unreserved, frank, candid; स्वभावोत्तानहृदयं <ls>Ś. 5</ls> frank-minded. {@--5@} Elevated; <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--6@} Concave; having the mouth upwards. {@--7@} Shallow.
